entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
